roleset.name: give credentials
roleset.note: ACCREDIT-V NOTES: Framed by Neville. (from accredit.01-v)

example.name: passive, arg1 and arg2
example.text: There is Jiakun Liu who [*T*-7] was accredited [*-8]as an " excellent memberof the Communist Party " of the province and a " labor model of the entirecountry " , [*-9] acting as the Party branch secretary .
example.arg: as an " excellent member of the Communist Party " of theprovince and a " lab\or model of the entire country "
